intro.title: Server
intro.version: The material in this guide is based on the latest version of the system:

server.description: To setup your own running server, you must first acquire and set up the necessary hardware. Follow the button below for instructions regarding this hardware and its usage.

hardware.description: If you have already set up the hardware properly, you're ready to install the necessary software. Follow the button below for instructions on how to set up this software.
